item.description: Alla Hetman Hey everyone. Before we get into this, I am not a medical professional (sorry dad). Everything that I’ve written here is based on personal experience and publicly available information. If you’re considering doing an extended fast, do your own research. ‚úåüèΩ A couple of months ago, my marathon-running-roommate Kenton convinced me, my other roommate Tyler, and my girlfriend Mack to attempt a 72 hour fast with him. I’d been curious about fasting for a while but wanted to start with 24 hours and eventually work my way up to a full three days.
